title.de: HOCHLEISTUNGS-LITHIUM-IONEN-BATTERIE MIT VERBESSERTER ENERGIEDICHTE UND SICHERHEIT
title.en: HIGH-PERFORMANCE LITHIUM-ION BATTERY WITH IMPROVED ENERGY DENSITY AND SAFETY
title.fr: BATTERIE LITHIUM-ION HAUTE PERFORMANCE AVEC DENSITÉ ÉNERGÉTIQUE ET SÉCURITÉ AMÉLIORÉES

bibliographic_data.abstract: The present invention relates to a high-performance lithium-ion battery system featuring novel cathode and anode materials that significantly improve energy density while maintaining enhanced safety characteristics. The battery incorporates silicon nanowire anodes, lithium iron phosphate cathodes with carbon coating, and a proprietary solid electrolyte interface layer. The design includes advanced thermal management systems, overcharge protection mechanisms, and rapid charging capabilities. The battery demonstrates superior cycle life, reduced degradation, and improved performance across wide temperature ranges, making it suitable for electric vehicles, grid storage, and portable electronics applications.

paragraphs.text: The present invention relates to the field of energy storage systems, specifically to advanced lithium-ion battery technologies with improved energy density, safety features, and performance characteristics for various applications including electric vehicles and renewable energy storage.

Current lithium-ion battery technologies face limitations in energy density, charging speed, and safety concerns including thermal runaway, capacity degradation, and limited cycle life. These limitations hinder the widespread adoption of electric vehicles and renewable energy storage systems.

Existing battery designs struggle to balance high energy density with safety requirements, often requiring trade-offs that compromise performance. There is a critical need for battery technologies that can deliver both superior performance and enhanced safety features.

The present invention provides a lithium-ion battery system that overcomes the limitations of existing technologies by incorporating novel materials and design features that simultaneously improve energy density, safety, and performance characteristics.

claims.text: A lithium-ion battery comprising: a silicon nanowire anode; a lithium iron phosphate cathode with carbon coating; and a solid electrolyte interface layer, wherein the battery exhibits energy density greater than 300 Wh/kg.
The battery according to claim 1, further comprising a thermal management system with integrated cooling channels.
The battery according to claim 1, wherein the silicon nanowires have a diameter between 50-200 nanometers.
A battery pack comprising multiple batteries according to any of claims 1-3, with overcharge protection circuitry.

A method for manufacturing the battery according to claim 1, comprising: synthesizing silicon nanowires; coating cathode materials with carbon; and assembling components with precise electrolyte composition.
